briefTitle: High Dose Chemo With Autologous BMT for Treatment of Metastatic Breast Cancer
officialTitle: High Dose Chemotherapy With Autologous Bone Marrow Transplantation in the Treatment of Metastatic Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Once 10 patients enrolled in the study ar followed for at least 6 months, a preliminary analysis of the data will occur.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Histologically confirmed diagnosis of breast cancer
* Age 18-70
* Breast cancer at first clinical evidence of metastatic disease
* Must have objectively measurable or evaluable disease or be in complete remission

Exclusion Criteria:

* Previous diagnosis of another invasive carcinaom within 10 years (except skin cancer)
* CNS involvement
